## Token.totalSupply() method

Get the total minted supply of this token

**Signature:**

```typescript
totalSupply(): Promise<CurrencyValue>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;CurrencyValue&gt;

the total supply

## Example

```jsx
const supply = await program.totalSupply();
```
